thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: Easy to book even though I goofed and thought I was leaving Edmonton at 12:30 noon only to realize it was midnight. I did it when I was too tired and didn't consider there were overnight flights. So be very careful and don't choose your flight at 2:00 in the morning (I booked the next morning when I got up but had slept very little. Still it was so easy to book even with little sleep.
